description.en: Return the shortest path stream from the stream segment to which the given start point belongs to sea (outlet). The path is returned as GeoJSON FeatureCollection or GeometryCollection, depending  on user input. The geometries are LineStrings in both cases. The start and end segments are included.

comment.title: Comment
comment.description: Arbitrary string that will not be processed but returned, for user"s convenience.

path_feature_collection.title: Dijkstra shortest path to sea outlet
path_feature_collection.description: Shortest path from the provided location and the outlet of the river basin, as a FeatureCollection. Routing is done via Dijkstra algorithm. Subcatchment ids and strahler order of each line segment along the way are included.

downstream_ids.title: Subcatchment id of each line segment
downstream_ids.description: Subcatchment id of each line segment along the path. Can be provided as separate list. Will be included in the individual features anyway
